outline:
1. to be bereaved, make childless, miscarry
    1. (Qal) to be bereaved
    2. (Piel)
      1. to make childless
      2. to cause barrenness, show barrenness or abortion
      3. to miscarry
    3. (Hiphil) miscarrying (participle)
kjv_def: bereave (of children), barren, cast calf (fruit, young), be (make) childless, deprive, destroy, [idiom] expect, lose children, miscarry, rob of children, spoil.
strongs_def: properly, to miscarry, i.e. suffer abortion; by analogy, to bereave (literally or figuratively)
